column4: couldn't you try tty1  and login, setup the wlan0 and then ctrl+alt+f7
: If I connect through tty1, will the wlan be activted automatically ?
I think I have to check the wicd command line options if there are any.

i mean on the laptop, go to tty1 instead of loggin in from the GDM, then setup the wireless connection (a bit over my head still on all the details that need to configured manually)  then tty7 it back to the GDM
